what do i have to say for myself? just play this amazing valve game.
Хорошая игра и персонажи интересные , физика топ особенно когда на тебя падает бочка
Игра просто супер и голос у главного героя просто класс
La historia se comprende, puede que en varias ocaciones pueda llegar a ser un juego lento y aburrido pero al fin y al cabo es muy entretenido y a veces hasta frenetico

I absolutely recommend this 11/10 game due to how much easier it is compared to Half Life 1, the Breath Taking and Stunning Graphics, the Replay Value, the Story, the Characters, the Weapons, the Mechanics, and the fact that it runs perfectly at over 200 FPS for Modern Gaming Computers. Also I feel like Alyx Vance is such an amazing supportive character for Gordon since not only she is the daughter of Eli Vance but she can fight like a soldier and of course Eli Vance who survived the Black Mesa Incident and becomes the Leader of the Resistance since he founded it and of course Barney Calhoun from Blue Shift returns and even Isaac Kleiner returns as well. The Combine and Wallace Breen who is the Leader of the Combine are amazing and well executed villains that plan to seek world domination but the Resistance and Vortigaunts (who are now Allies thanks to Eli Vance) seek to destroy them and save humanity.
I absolutely give this game a 11/10 as it's one the greatest games of all time!
Я в ахуе даже с начала игры.
Um jogo extremamente divertido, recomendo bastante
Я фанат халфы и все это время я не писал положительный обзор на халфу.... Я каюсь !!!

Half-Life siempre ah sido mi juego favorito, mas que eso lo tengo en un altar alto, desde que tenia 8 años me la pasaba genial pasando sus capitulos y conociendo a sus personajes, hasta cuando no tenia luz o me iba de viaje prendia mi laptop y jugaba esta obra maestra, decirle lo excelente que es quedaria muy corto ademas que tiene tanto para hablar y detallar pero solo puedo decir a las personas que aun no lo han jugado lo recomiendo infinitamente, diviertanse, descubran e intenten sacar sus logros que quedaran satisfechos, Muchas Gracias Valve por todo aunque no haya sacado una tercera entrega igual lo agradezco.

Me lo recomendó un amigo hace tiempo pero era reacio a jugarlo. Lo acabo de pillar y mi primer try han sido 3 horas sin parar, me pegaría otras 3 horas si no fuera porque me han dado las tantas de la noche xD. BUENARDO, cómpralo si tienes la posibilidad y pégate un buen vicio.
очень хорошая игра прошел на одном дыхании, лучше некоторых новых

It's fun. A little scary too. Would recommend.

Terrific from start to finish, graphics look good cranked all the way up, shooting feels responsive and accurate, has characters that are actually fun to play along side and the game doesn't baby sit you and lets you figure out mechanics and puzzles by your self, the atmosphere is oddly creepy yet engaging. Overall this is a work of art 10/10 all day long.......... ep3 pls!!!
Mesmo depois de anos continua sendo um dos melhores jogos da Steam!

THIS GAME IS A MASTERPIECE!!!!
I have been playing Half Life 2 since the day I was born, and it NEVER gets old. The graphics are very advanced for the time, and the game play is just awesome. The story is a perfect way to pick up from the first game, and never gets boring at all. one minute, you're fighting with rebels to remove alien overlords from your world. Next thing you know, you're breaking into the control center of the alien species! I can not get over how great this game is. it is awesome.

Обычно сиквел хуже оригинала, но тут все совсем иначе. Прости Half-Life, но твоя младшая сестра тебя переплюнула.
